title: Amy Hennig’s Captain America/Black Panther Game?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.09.22
description:
IGN's Stella Chung continues her one-woman bullying campaign against Greg Miller and also talks about a couple Marvel D23 rumors!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:39 - Housekeeping

ATTENTION!!!

Our LIVE tests continue! Starting Monday for the rest of September:

Kinda Funny Games Daily will be LIVE at 10AM PT every weekday on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames


All Kinda Funny Screencasts will be LIVE on YouTube.com/KindaFunny whenever they record

TODAY:

At 1PM PT we are reacting to @blessingjr hosting the D23 Disney & Marvel Games Showcase LIVE on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames


TOMORROW:

At 10AM PT we are reacting to the D23 Marvel Studios/Lucasfilm Panel LIVE on YouTube.com/KindaFunny


At 12PM PT we are reacting to the Ubisoft Forward LIVE on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames


The Roper Report  -

00:08:35 - ‘Uncharted’ Creator’s Marvel Game Is Rumored to Be A WW2 Captain America Game
00:16:16 - EA's Rumored Iron Man Game Will Reportedly Be Revealed At The Disney D23 Marvel Showcase Today
00:21:31 - Tomb Raider And Deus Ex Are Now Officially Owned By Crystal Dynamics And Eidos Montreal
00:29:05 - CD Projekt introduces official modding tool for Cyberpunk 2077 REDmod available now
00:34:00 - Ad
00:36:11 - Lara Croft You’re Wrong
00:38:15 - Twisted Metal Episode 1 Leak
00:43:54 - COD Event incoming
00:46:28 - Out today
00:48:11 - Squad Up: Nick - GG App - https://ggapp.io/Secondsolution
00:49:52 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Greg and Tim
Tuesday: Blessing and Greg
Wednesday: Blessing and Greg
Thursday: Blessing and TIm
Friday: Tim and Blessing
